com.ibm.team.process.client

Interface IProcessClientService

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IProcessItemService

    public interface IProcessClientService
    Process client library which provides access to the most commonly required functionality of the Process component. This interface should be all that is required for clients implementing process-enabled components.

    More detailed APIs (those required by the rest of the Process component itself) are available on the client library IProcessItemService.

    This interface is not intended to be implemented by clients.

    Since:
    0.5

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.util.Collection ALL_PROPERTIES
      Convenience constant for use with the various find methods to specify that a complete item is to be retrieved.

      IDevelopmentLine getDevelopmentLine(IProcessArea processArea, org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
      Returns the development line to which the given process area belongs or null if the given process area does not belong to a development line.

    • Field Detail

      • ALL_PROPERTIES

        static final java.util.Collection ALL_PROPERTIES
        Convenience constant for use with the various find methods to specify that a complete item is to be retrieved.

    • Method Detail

      • getClientProcess

        IClientProcess getClientProcess(IProcessArea processArea,
                              org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
                                throws TeamRepositoryException
        Returns the client process governing the given process area. The returned process will already be initialized.
        Parameters:
        processArea - the process area
        monitor - a progress monitor or null
        Returns:
        the client process governing the given process area
        Throws:
        TeamRepositoryException - in case this operation fails
        org.eclipse.core.runtime.OperationCanceledException - in case this operation has been canceled

      • findProcessArea

        IProcessArea findProcessArea(java.net.URI areaURI,
                           java.util.Collection properties,
                           org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
                             throws TeamRepositoryException
        Returns the process area for the given URI. URIs have been chosen for future extensibility. Currently only hierarchical URIs are supported. Only the path segment of the hierarchical URI is considered. The first segment should be the name of a project area, the following segments should be the names of team areas.

        The returned area is managed by the item manager.

        Parameters:
        areaURI - the URI
        properties - the list of required process area properties; use ALL_PROPERTIES to retrieve a complete item.
        monitor - a progress monitor or null
        Returns:
        the process area for the given URI or null
        Throws:
        TeamRepositoryException - in case this operation fails
        org.eclipse.core.runtime.OperationCanceledException - in case this operation has been canceled

      • getDevelopmentLine

        IDevelopmentLine getDevelopmentLine(IProcessArea processArea,
                                  org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
                                    throws TeamRepositoryException
        Returns the development line to which the given process area belongs or null if the given process area does not belong to a development line.
        Parameters:
        processArea - the process area
        monitor - a progress monitor or null
        Returns:
        the development line to which the given process area belongs or null if the given team area does not belong to a development line
        Throws:
        TeamAreaHierarchyException - in case the given process area is a team area which does not belong to a project area. This can occur if the team area has not been correctly added to a project area and has never been saved to the repository.
        TeamRepositoryException - in case this operation fails
        org.eclipse.core.runtime.OperationCanceledException - in case this operation has been canceled
        Since:
        0.6

      • execute

        IOperationReport execute(ProcessRunnable runnable,
                       java.lang.String name,
                       org.eclipse.core.runtime.IProgressMonitor monitor)
                         throws TeamRepositoryException
        Executes the given process runnable. This method should only be called once for a given runnable.

        The given runnable is executed without support for advisors or participants

        Parameters:
        runnable - the runnable
        name - a user-presentable name for the given runnable
        monitor - a progress monitor
        Returns:
        the report computed for the given runnable or null
        Throws:
        TeamOperationCanceledException - if a nested operation is cancelled by process
        TeamRepositoryException - any team repository exceptions thrown by the given runnable are rethrown by this method
        java.lang.RuntimeException - any runtime exceptions thrown by the given runnable are rethrown by this method
        Since:
        0.6
